name: San Mateo County Library Open Sewing Programs
description: Free open sewing and mending programs at multiple library branches including Foster City, Half Moon Bay, Millbrae, Redwood City, San Mateo, and South San Francisco
fullDescription: San Mateo County Libraries offer free open sewing and mending programs at multiple branches, helping residents repair clothing and learn sewing skills.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free sewing and mending programs
- Available at multiple library branches
- Foster City, Half Moon Bay locations
- Millbrae, Redwood City branches
- San Mateo, South San Francisco
- Equipment and supplies provided
howToGetIt:
1. Check library schedule online
2. Find sewing program near you
3. Bring items needing repair
4. Attend during program hours
5. Get help from volunteers
6. Learn sewing skills
